tool_description: Records completed loyalty point transactions with full details for audit, compliance, and customer service purposes.

point_breakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of how points were calculated

processing_time.description: When points were processed and added

customer_tier.description: Customer tier at time of transaction

applied_promotions.description: List of promotions applied to this transaction

fraud_risk_score.description: Risk assessment score for the transaction

error_messages: Missing required field: All required parameters must be provided.
Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be positive.
Invalid points value: points_earned must be non-negative integer.
Invalid date format: All date fields must be in ISO 8601 format.
Logging failed: Unable to write transaction log due to system error.
Invalid tier: customer_tier must be Bronze, Silver, Gold, or Platinum.
Empty breakdown: point_breakdown array cannot be empty.
usage: Provide complete transaction details after points have been calculated and awarded. This creates a permanent audit record of the loyalty transaction.

log_id.description: Unique identifier for this log entry

retention_period.description: Days this log will be retained for compliance
